items.title: At Starbase, SpaceX is taking firefighting into its own hands
items.summary: SpaceX's company town has formed a volunteer fire department, extending control over both the emergency response and permitting process as the company looks to expand Starbase.

What we love

When spending the night away from home, it’s often hard to know what your power situation is going to look like. Add this power strip to your travel bag and you’ll be ready for that time when you only end up with a single AC outlet. It will turn one into four and also deliver two USB-A and one 20W Type-C output.

What we love

Cars can run into problems regularly over time, so it’s always smart to prep by stocking up on handy tools and devices. One such investment worth considering is this Greenworks model that you can power with the included 2.0Ah battery or by plugging into your vehicle’s 12V auxiliary outlet, making it well-suited to stay in your trunk until needed. There’s a digital display for real-time readouts, an auto-cut off function for safety and a prolonged lifespan, as well as built-in LED lights to see what you’re doing in the dark, and more.

items.title: Inaudible sound might be the next frontier in wildfire defense
items.summary: Sonic Fire Tech has developed a device that can extinguish flames using acoustic energy below the range of human hearing. The startup is building a demo capable of protecting a home.

items.title: Spotify partners with Netflix for video podcast distribution deal
items.summary: Spotify is partnering with Netflix to bring select video podcasts to the streaming platform starting in early 2026. The deal will feature curated shows from Spotify Studios and The Ringer, expanding later to include more genres. The move reflects Spotify’s growing focus on video as a key driver for engagement and ad revenue, with video podcast consumption now growing 20 times faster than audio-only content.

items.summary: The changes, which raised the retirement age from 62 to 64, were seen as signature reforms in Emmanuel Macron's presidency.

items.title: You’ll soon be able to shop Walmart from ChatGPT
items.summary: Walmart is partnering with OpenAI to let shoppers buy products directly through ChatGPT. The new integration will allow users to link their Walmart accounts, browse items, and instantly check out — all within the chatbot.

items.title: Google updates Search and Discover with collapsible ads, AI features, and more
items.summary: Google is rolling out updates to Search and Discover that introduce AI-powered features, improved navigation, and a new option to collapse ads. While users can now hide sponsored results, the “Sponsored” label will remain visible as they scroll — making ads persistent even when collapsed. Additional changes include new sports updates in Search and AI-driven topic previews in the Discover feed, launching first in the U.S., South Korea, and India.

items.title: 24 hours with Trump on diplomatic tornado through Middle East
